title: stuck at authenticating
body: cant login please spread the word

replies.body: We had login issues earlier, but everything should be okay now.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=kiJT7jxG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-03T23:48:31.987+0000)
>
> We had login issues earlier, but everything should be okay now.

The login issues are back

Yeah, I was playing ranked, got disconnected mid game (even though my internet was still working) and now I can't log in.
{{sticker:sg-janna}}
Agreed! Login issues are back. I finished a ranked game and when I was returned to Windows, my client had disconnected. I can no longer authenticate and login.{{sticker:sona-playing}}

Had the same problem in the middle of a game, got disconnected and then I got banned? PLS{{item:3073}}
Only on promos of course.
Is there ANYTHING you can share about this? I've been stuck on Authentication for 2 days now.
Same for EUW, can't connect due to authenticate. If i run repair tool it lets met login once, other tries afterwards fail again.
